/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A white car is seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings in the background. These buildings, with their modern design, exhibit a blend of traditional and contemporary architectural styles, reflecting the city's rich history and its embrace of modernity. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's vibrant street life and its harmonious coexistence with nature.
